attributes.action: abolish the latest road tax proposals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the road tax proposed will take into account cars allready purchased from as early as 2001.this is totaly unfair and will affect millions of tax paying road users who allready pay a premium. im not against new laws for new cars, but to tax cars that people have owned and maintained is outragous

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
